title: Snowed In, Snow Day
itunes:title: Snowed In, Snow Day
description:
Tuesday 3/14- Well the snow didn't stop Angela and Dj Envy for coming in. As Charlamagne stayed home Angela and Envy gave the latest news on the weather and entertainment, and also was entertained by our listeners as we opened up the phone lines on several topics. Also, because Charlamagne was not here we had listeners call up to tell who they want for Donkey of the Day.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Tuesday 3/14- Well the snow didn't stop Angela and Dj Envy for coming in. As Charlamagne stayed home Angela and Envy gave the latest news on the weather and entertainment, and also was entertained by our listeners as we opened up the phone lines on several topics. Also, because Charlamagne was not here we had listeners call up to tell who they want for Donkey of the Day.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
